font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 汇合，混合：the coming together of two or more things to the same point
【例】a happy confluence of beautiful weather and spectacular scenery during our vacation 旅途中美好的天气 和壮丽的景色令人欣喜的汇合
【近】conjunction
【反】divergence 分叉

【记】 con + flu flow 流→流到一起
